ChangingNextLegSignals.Title: C
ChangingNextLegSignals.Description: The position of the next mark has been changed:

ChangingNextLegSignals.Title: To Decrease
ChangingNextLegSignals.Description: To decrease the length of the leg.

ChangingNextLegSignals.Title: To Increase
ChangingNextLegSignals.Description: To increase the length of the leg.
